channel.title: Setup on Connector 365 Online Help
channel.description: Recent content in Setup on Connector 365 Online Help

item.title: Report Layout Selection
item.description: Setup Report Layout Selection You can reach the setup of different report layouts through the particular report selection. Currently the following report selections are supported: Sales Purchase Reminder/Finance Charge After reaching the report selection you will find the field Report Layout Selection in the lines. The number there, shows how many different report layouts are setup for the specific report ID. By clicking the number you reach the Report Layout Selection.

item.title: User Placeholder Setup
item.description: Setup User Placeholder Setup To set up the user placeholders, first navigate to the User setup page. There you can access the setup via the User placeholder setup action. In the user placeholder setup, you can set up dynamic placeholders using table fields. Fields from the following tables are currently supported: User setup User In the Placeholder field, you define the character string which is replaced in the email text by the values of the field stored in the Definition field.
